definitions.definition: A device used to detonate an explosive device etc.
A small explosive device attached to the railhead to provide an audible warning when a train passes over it.
Any explosive whose action is practically instantaneous .
A gun fired by a percussion cap .

main_definition: A device used to detonate an explosive device etc.
secondary_definitions: ( rail transport , UK ) A small explosive device attached to the railhead to provide an audible warning when a train passes over it.
( archaic ) Any explosive whose action is practically instantaneous .
( obsolete ) A gun fired by a percussion cap .
